description:
Ever wanted to know what your favorite marriage candidate would look like in a school uniform? Wonder no longer! This set allows you to dress up all 10 marriage candidates to give Olive Town a more campus-like atmosphere.

* To change the marriage candidates' outfits, select "Downloadable Content" from the title screen, then enable the outfits in the "Apply Downloadable Content" menu.
* Marriage candidate outfit sets are not available for marriage candidates added in the Expansion Packs.
name: School Uniforms (Marriage Candidates)
